title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 121.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 121.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Article 2-A was added to the Vehicle and Traffic Law
(effective July 1, 1970) in response to court procedures which were too
cumbersome to handle the relatively large volume of traffic violations. It was
decided that noncriminal traffic cases could be more effectively handled
administratively by the Department of Motor Vehicles. The Commissioner of Motor

Vehicles was authorized by this law (L. 1969, ch. 1074, as amended) to
establish a system for the administrative adjudication of moving traffic
infractions and to promulgate regulations detailing the procedure. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
121.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
